title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Utilizing Modeling Languages for Constructivist-Based Distance Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Using PALO-based EML tools, learners design three learning scenarios reflecting constructivist characteristics (learner autonomy, contextual problem-solving, collaborative learning), and earn 4+ points (5-point scale) in each of three expert review criteria (content relevance, technical implementation, educational effectiveness) for a total of 12+ points
Development of 2 learning contents applicable to various delivery media through XML-based abstraction.
Planning and implementing at least 3 collaborative learning activities based on constructivist principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
